title: Lake living! Rent on the water!
posting_body: 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment available now at the Riviera Apartments!
Located on Lakeshore Blvd, our apartments are nesteled right on Lake Erie, close to shopping, restaurants and activities.
-washer and dryers located in the building
-water is a flat rate, All electric, no gas bill
